articles.title: Breakingviews - Chipotle's burrito spat heats up restaurant wars - Reuters
articles.description: The fight for the American office lunch is getting spicy. Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG.N)
articles.content: TORONTO, April 6 (Reuters Breakingviews) - The fight for the American office lunch is getting spicy. Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG.N)sued salad purveyor Sweetgreen (SG.N) this week for using its tradem… [+2713 chars]
